# Talented (Trait)
## Overview
**Talented**: You are a virtuoso musician, actor, or storyteller. You gain a +1 trait bonus on checks with a single [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] skill (your choice), and all [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] skills are always class skills for you. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
